website_summaries.verdict: Optimized design in the club head and hosel gives you better performance.
pros: Offered in 3 club face lofts between 9 and 12 degrees, so you can pick the best one to match your game
Uses a flexible face material that allows your off-center ball strikes to maintain speed and velocity, keeping the ball on line better
cons: Aimed at less experienced players versus low handicap shooters

customer_reviews.title: Best stick in my bag!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve played four 9 hole rounds so far with This Driver and I have to say, save yourself some money and buy this club instead of the ones that are $200 more. You’ll be very surprised at the distance and the forgiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great driver!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this driver. I can tell how much straighter I hit the ball and how much I don’t miss hit the ball. Very light weight and a very nice sound when contacting the ball. Highly recommend this driver.
customer_reviews.author: YabbaDabba

customer_reviews.title: Better than the 10.5 ° driver!
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing the 10.5° driver, thinking that the loft was correct for a late 70s year old golfer, I soon learned that it hit the ball too high and had to switch to the 9° driver which was much better in terms of height and forward roll.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Clemente

customer_reviews.title: Loss of yardage and not as consistent
customer_reviews.text: My clubs are all Cleveland; mashie hybrids and irons, wedges save for the driver. I wanted this driver to replace my current driver - Callaway XHot and based upon reviews and a few swings decided to give this a shot. Initial reaction was that this just may work but over time determined that it was not a replacement for the Callaway. Definitely did not hit it as far nor as consistent. I have played over 20 rounds with it and tonight went back to my Callaway; from the first hole noticeably more distance and as I played on more consistency.
customer_reviews.author: BMac

customer_reviews.title: SOLID!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I took out my Cleveland launcher for the first time without any practice and the first drive was hit solid buy went right. The next hole my drive went right down the middle and was hit solid. I finally found the driver of my dreams. I don't have to make any hand adjustments and my drives are right down the middle and solid and long. If there were a 10 star rating, I would give that for this driver.
customer_reviews.author: Shogun

customer_reviews.title: No head cover as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a 2012 CG Black for years and have been very happy with it, Just received this today so haven't tried it yet. Just one thing, it came without head cover as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Gurr

customer_reviews.title: Straighter drives
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this driver. I have always had issues hitting a driver, now I went from accepting 180 to 200 yard drives to hitting 230 on a regular basis. Actually hit one 267 yards last week. I’ve hit them more consistently and straighter with this club!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Davidowicz

customer_reviews.title: Always a little skeptical of club claims
customer_reviews.text: But holy cow! I have a nasty slice that I have to over correct for with an exaggerated strong grip to get it to go straight, but my distance suffers because the grip prevents a free-flowing swing. With this club, my first four hits I just went to a neutral grip and let rip. I have never hit it so straight and so far four times in a row. Went on to hit a bucket of balls and only about one in ten still had my slice, but it was a much tamer slice slightly right, not the wicked bow curve I usually have. MAGIC DRIVER !
customer_reviews.author: HDelta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, an new version of my 8 year old Launcher...sticking with what works.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Davis

customer_reviews.title: Forgiving Driver
customer_reviews.text: The Cleveland HB Driver is very forgiving and has enabled me to drive better, more accurately and longer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Kahn

customer_reviews.title: A Great Driver ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the Cleveland Launcher drivers for years but this is the best one they have put out.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Steven Shea

customer_reviews.title: Most Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Yep, I’m a woman who knows nothing about golf. I put five different drivers in my cart, called our golf crazy son, and he said Dad would LOVE it. He did.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: A lightweight inexpensive Driver
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight inexpensive Driver for seniors, easier to swing. The only thing that disturbing me is the sound when the ball hit the sweet spot(cracking sound).
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No miracles!
customer_reviews.text: Like any new driver, you always are hoping for a miracle where you hit it long and straight. The problem is you’re the one using it 😊. Nice club for the money though.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Hit it high on the face low on the face heel shot or toe shot it's very forgiving all of those shots went as far as my old driver when you hit it on the sweet spot it's amazing the sound let's your buddy's know you just launched 1
customer_reviews.author: Timduhan

customer_reviews.title: You can still hit bad shots with a good club🤔
customer_reviews.text: The club face is lively, I like the feel of the the club and the length of the club is a little longer than my previous driver which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleveland Driver
customer_reviews.text: Best driver I have ever owned. Better distance and accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Gretnatiger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great driver much straighter than my old driver and about 10 yards further.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Matson

customer_reviews.title: Straight
customer_reviews.text: Straight, easy to hit, maybe not the longest, but hitting more fairways
customer_reviews.author: KETOBRA

customer_reviews.title: Cleveland Scores Again!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved my Cleveland Hi-bore driver but needed to update and this Driver does that better than well! It added 10 or 20 yards to my drives with the same swing. I couldn't have asked for a better club to replace a dear old friend. Cleveland ROCKS!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary P Hess

customer_reviews.title: Longer and straighter
customer_reviews.text: Finally replaced my old Nike driver and now wonder what took me so long. It took me a few swings on the range to get the feeling of this club. My first round with it was very successful. Looking forward to many more.
customer_reviews.author: Steve 88

customer_reviews.title: excelent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great driver for the pricing, I still need to get used to hitting it in the center but when I hit the center ball, man it flies!!! I am 21+ Handicap and this really helps my game to be closer to the greens in less shots.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Manuel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Driver
customer_reviews.text: Very well made driver. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: lisa e.

customer_reviews.title: Great driver
customer_reviews.text: Been using a 10 year old driver. Bought this and did not disappoint. 56 years old and hit straight and picked up some distance.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Glascott

customer_reviews.title: For hubby. He loves it, but to be ...
customer_reviews.text: For hubby. He loves it, but to be honest, he loves all of the golf clubs purchsed - for about a year!! Then a new one next golf season.
customer_reviews.author: S S Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a no frills quality club & I got ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a no frills quality club & I got it with this driver. Bought10.5 degree, regular flex shaft & head cover included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Believe the Reviews
customer_reviews.text: 58 year old..last driver was 8 years ago. Hit the ping and callaway along with the Taylor Made. All good drivers-but this one worked for me for a couple hundred less. At LEAST 10-15 yards longer. First club I have ever had with a regular flex..I slowed down in the last 8 years I guess-and it’s still longer.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBob

product_meta.title: Cleveland Golf Men's Launcher HB Driver
product_meta.description: The next evolution of Launcher and HiBore technologies combine to produce exceptional speed, distance, and control. The new HiBore Crown promotes higher ball speed through the crown flexing at impact and a desirable high-launch, low-spin trajectory from a lower center-of-gravity. Unique Flex-Fins compress at impact transferring more energy back to the ball for longer distances, especially on heel and toe impacts. New Launcher Cup-Face creates higher COR across the entire face for unmatched balls speed and distance. Ultra-lightweight hosel design redistributes weight low and deep for a higher launch and more forgiveness.
